p: The IC 50 value for each compound was calculated using GraphPad Prism (non-linear regression). Selectivity Index (SI) for Compound 1 or doxorubicin was calculated by dividing the IC 50 for its cytotoxic effect in the normal cell (MRC5) by the IC 50 for its cytotoxic effect in the cancer variant (MRC5-SV2).
